text: Melum, sulaimanukku karrai vacappatuttit tantom. Atan kalaip payanam oru mata turamum, atan malaip payanam oru mata turamumaka iruntatu. Innum, cempai urru (nirai)p pol nam avarukku (uruki) otacceytom. Tan iraivanutaiya kattalaippati avarukku velai ceyyakkutiya jinkalaiyum nam avarukku vacappatuttik kotuttu (avarukku kattuppattu natappatil) avarkalil evan nam kattalaiyaip purakkanikkirano avanai naraka vetanaiyaic cuvaikkum pati nam ceyvom (enrom)
